trans-unit.source: Derive from this class to implement a custom state machine for receive context functionality.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自這個類別實作的自訂狀態機器接收內容功能。

trans-unit.source: Receive context functionality is two-fold.
trans-unit.target: 接收內容功能是一體兩面。

trans-unit.source: When working with a queued channel, receive context allows you to lock a message prior to processing it.
trans-unit.target: 當使用佇列通道時，收到內容可讓您鎖定訊息前先處理它。

trans-unit.source: If a failure occurs, the message remains locked so that the service that is processing the message maintains ownership (another service cannot receive and process the same message) and may choose to perform some other action on it.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生失敗，訊息就會保持鎖定，讓正在處理訊息的服務會維持的所有權 （其他服務無法接收和處理相同的訊息） 並可選擇加以執行某些其他動作。

trans-unit.source: When working with a one-way channel, receive context allows a service to control when it sends an acknowledgement message or it can indicate a problem by sending a negative acknowledgement message.
trans-unit.target: 使用單向通道，接收時內容可讓服務控制傳送認可訊息，或藉由傳送負認可訊息可能表示有問題。

trans-unit.source: The client can then choose to resend the message if it receives a negative acknowledgement or if it does not receive an acknowledgement within a certain period of time.
trans-unit.target: 然後，用戶端可以選擇重新傳送訊息，如果收到負認可，或它不會收到一段時間內認可。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReceiveContext"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReceiveContext"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Causes the state machine to transition to the abandoned state with the specified timeout value.
trans-unit.target: 引起狀態機器轉換至已放棄的狀態與指定的逾時值。

trans-unit.source: The timeout for the abandon operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成之放棄作業逾時。

trans-unit.source: Causes the state machine to transition to the abandoned state with the specified exception and timeout value.
trans-unit.target: 引起狀態機器轉換至已放棄的狀態與指定的例外狀況和逾時值。

trans-unit.source: The exception that causes the abandon operation.
trans-unit.target: 引起放棄作業的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The timeout for the abandon operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成之放棄作業逾時。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous abandon operation with the specified timeout, asynchronous callback, and user-defined state data.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步的放棄作業與指定的逾時、 非同步回呼與使用者定義狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: The timeout for the abandon operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成之放棄作業逾時。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous callback delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.
trans-unit.target: 非同步回呼委派，會接收非同步作業完成通知。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined state data.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous abandon operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IAsyncResult>，參考非同步放棄作業。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous abandon operation with the specified exception, timeout, asynchronous callback, and user-defined state data.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步的放棄作業使用指定的例外狀況、 逾時、 非同步回呼，與使用者定義狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: An exception that contains the reason for the abandon operation.
trans-unit.target: 包含放棄作業原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The timeout for the abandon operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成之放棄作業逾時。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous callback delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.
trans-unit.target: 非同步回呼委派，會接收非同步作業完成通知。

trans-unit.source: the user-defined state data.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous abandon operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>，參考非同步放棄作業。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous complete operation with the specified timeout, asynchronous callback, and user-defined state data.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步完成作業，以指定的逾時、 非同步回呼與使用者定義狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: The timeout for the complete operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成之完成作業逾時。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous callback delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.
trans-unit.target: 非同步回呼委派，會接收非同步作業完成通知。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined state data.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous complete operation.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IAsyncResult>會參考非同步完成作業。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Causes the state machine to transition to the completed state with the specified timeout value.
trans-unit.target: 引起狀態機器轉換至已完成的狀態與指定的逾時值。

trans-unit.source: The timeout for the complete operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成之完成作業逾時。

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous abandon operation.
trans-unit.target: 完成非同步的放棄作業。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by a call to one of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowControlClient.BeginAbandon*> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>的其中一個呼叫所傳回的<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowControlClient.BeginAbandon*>方法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowControlClient.BeginAbandon*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous complete operation.
trans-unit.target: 完成非同步的完成作業。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by a call to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReceiveContext.BeginComplete*> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>呼叫所傳回的<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReceiveContext.BeginComplete*>方法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReceiveContext.BeginComplete*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Causes the state machine to transition to the faulted state.
trans-unit.target: 引起狀態機器轉換至錯誤的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Defines the event to raised when an exception has occurred during the messaging process.
trans-unit.target: 定義要在訊息處理期間發生例外狀況時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The name of the receive context.
trans-unit.target: 接收內容的名稱。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Called when the state machine is transitioning to the abandoned state with the specified timeout value.
trans-unit.target: 當狀態機器正在轉換至已放棄的狀態與指定的逾時值時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The timeout for the abandon operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成之放棄作業逾時。

trans-unit.source: The timeout for the abandon operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成之放棄作業逾時。

trans-unit.target: 非同步回呼委派，會接收非同步作業完成通知。

trans-unit.source: The user defined state data.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IAsyncResult>，參考非同步作業。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Called when the state machine is transitioning to the abandoned state asynchronously with the specified exception, timeout value, callback, and state data.
trans-unit.target: 當狀態機器正在轉換至已放棄的狀態，使用指定的例外狀況、 逾時值、 回呼與狀態資料，以非同步方式呼叫。

trans-unit.source: An exception that contains the reason for the abandon operation.
trans-unit.target: 包含放棄作業原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The timeout for the abandon operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成之放棄作業逾時。

trans-unit.target: 非同步回呼委派，會接收非同步作業完成通知。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined state data.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IAsyncResult>，參考非同步作業。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Called when the state machine is transitioning to the completed state asynchronously with the specified timeout, callback, and state data.
trans-unit.target: 當狀態機器正在轉換至已完成狀態時，使用指定的逾時、 回呼與狀態資料時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The timeout for the complete operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成之完成作業逾時。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous callback delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.
trans-unit.target: 非同步回呼委派，會接收非同步作業完成通知。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined state data.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IAsyncResult>，參考非同步作業。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Called when the state machine is transitioning to the completed state with the specified timeout value.
trans-unit.target: 當狀態機器正在轉換至與指定的逾時值為已完成狀態時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The timeout for the complete operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成之完成作業逾時。

trans-unit.target: 當狀態機器正在非同步轉換至已放棄的狀態時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by a call to one of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReceiveContext.OnBeginAbandon*> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>的其中一個呼叫所傳回的<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReceiveContext.OnBeginAbandon*>方法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReceiveContext.OnBeginAbandon*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Called when the state machine is transitioning to the completed state asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 當狀態機器正在非同步轉換至已完成狀態時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by a call to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReceiveContext.OnBeginComplete*>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>呼叫所傳回的<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReceiveContext.OnBeginComplete*></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReceiveContext.OnBeginComplete*></xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.target: 當狀態機器正在轉換至錯誤的狀態時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the state of the state machine.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定狀態機器的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The current receive context state of the state machine.
trans-unit.target: 目前的接收內容狀態的狀態機器。

trans-unit.source: An object used for locking the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReceiveContext"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 用於鎖定的物件<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReceiveContext"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Attempts to get the receive context from the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試取得接收內容，從指定的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The message.
trans-unit.target: 訊息。

trans-unit.source: The receive context.
trans-unit.target: 接收內容。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the receive context is retrieved successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果接收內容會擷取可順利啟動。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to get the receive context from the specified message properties collection.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試從指定的訊息屬性集合取得接收內容。

trans-unit.source: The message properties collection.
trans-unit.target: 訊息屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: The receive context.
trans-unit.target: 接收內容。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the receive context is retrieved successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果接收內容會擷取可順利啟動。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
